verses.verse: These also are the generations <WH8435> of Aharon <WH175> and Mosheh <WH4872> in the day <WH3117> that the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8763> with Mosheh <WH4872> in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>.
And these are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175>; Nadav <WH5070> the firstborn <WH1060>, and Abihu <WH30>, Eleazar <WH499>, and Ithamar <WH385>.

These are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175>, the Kohanim <WH3548> which were anointed <WH4886> <WH8803>, whom he consecrated <WH4390> <WH8765> <WH3027> to minister in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>.

And Nadav <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30> died <WH4191> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, when they offered <WH7126> <WH8687> strange <WH2114> <WH8801> fire <WH784> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, and they had no children <WH1121>: and Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar <WH385> ministered in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8762> in the sight <WH6440> of Aharon <WH175> their father <WH1>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Bring <WH7126> the tribe <WH4294> of Levi <WH3878> near <WH7126> <WH8685>, and present <WH5975> <WH8689> them before <WH6440> Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548>, that they may minister <WH8334> <WH8765> unto him.

And they shall keep <WH8104> <WH8804> his charge <WH4931>, and the charge <WH4931> of the whole congregation <WH5712> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, to do <WH5647> <WH8800> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908>.

And they shall keep <WH8104> <WH8804> all the instruments <WH3627> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and the charge <WH4931> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, to do <WH5647> <WH8800> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908>.

And thou shalt give <WH5414> <WH8804> the L'vi'im <WH3881> unto Aharon <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>: they are wholly given <WH5414> <WH8803> unto him out of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And thou shalt appoint <WH6485> <WH8799> Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, and they shall wait on <WH8104> <WH8804> their Kohen's office <WH3550>: and the stranger <WH2114> <WH8801> that cometh nigh <WH7131> shall be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

And I, behold, I have taken <WH3947> <WH8804> the L'vi'im <WH3881> from among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> instead of all the firstborn <WH1060> that openeth <WH6363> the matrix <WH7358> among the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: therefore the L'vi'im <WH3881> shall be mine;

Because all the firstborn <WH1060> are mine; for on the day <WH3117> that I smote <WH5221> <WH8687> all the firstborn <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> I hallowed <WH6942> <WH8689> unto me all the firstborn <WH1060> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, both man <WH120> and beast <WH929>: mine shall they be: I am the YY <WH3068>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Number <WH6485> <WH8798> the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> after the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, by their families <WH4940>: every male <WH2145> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> shalt thou number <WH6485> <WH8799> them.
And Mosheh <WH4872> numbered <WH6485> <WH8799> them according to the word <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>, as he was commanded <WH6680> <WH8795>.
And these were the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> by their names <WH8034>; Gershon <WH1648>, and K'hat <WH6955>, and M'rari <WH4847>.
And these are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> by their families <WH4940>; Libni <WH3845>, and Shimei <WH8096>.
And the sons <WH1121> of K'hat <WH6955> by their families <WH4940>; Amram <WH6019>, and Izehar <WH3324>, Hevron <WH2275>, and Uzziel <WH5816>.

And the sons <WH1121> of M'rari <WH4847> by their families <WH4940>; Mahli <WH4249>, and Mushi <WH4187>. These are <WH1992> the families <WH4940> of the L'vi'im <WH3881> according to the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>.
Of Gershon <WH1648> was the family <WH4940> of the Libnites <WH3846>, and the family <WH4940> of the Shimites <WH8097>: these are the families <WH4940> of the Gershonites <WH1649>.

Those that were numbered <WH6485> <WH8803> of them, according to the number <WH4557> of all the males <WH2145>, from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, even those that were numbered <WH6485> <WH8803> of them were seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.
The families <WH4940> of the Gershonites <WH1649> shall pitch <WH2583> <WH8799> behind <WH310> the tabernacle <WH4908> westward <WH3220>.
And the chief <WH5387> of the house <WH1004> of the father <WH1> of the Gershonites <WH1649> shall be Eliyahaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Lael <WH3815>.

And the charge <WH4931> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> shall be the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the tent <WH168>, the covering <WH4372> thereof, and the hanging <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>,

And the hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691>, and the parokhet <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the court <WH2691>, which is by the tabernacle <WH4908>, and by the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>, and the cords <WH4340> of it for all the service <WH5656> thereof.

And of K'hat <WH6955> was the family <WH4940> of the Amramites <WH6020>, and the family <WH4940> of the Izeharites <WH3325>, and the family <WH4940> of the Hevronites <WH2276>, and the family <WH4940> of the Uzzielites <WH5817>: these are the families <WH4940> of the K'hatis <WH6956>.

In the number <WH4557> of all the males <WH2145>, from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, were eight <WH8083> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>, keeping <WH8104> <WH8802> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary <WH6944>.
The families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of K'hat <WH6955> shall pitch <WH2583> <WH8799> on the side <WH3409> of the tabernacle <WH4908> southward <WH8486>.
And the chief <WH5387> of the house <WH1004> of the father <WH1> of the families <WH4940> of the K'hatis <WH6956> shall be Elizaphan <WH469> the son <WH1121> of Uzziel <WH5816>.

And their charge <WH4931> shall be the ark <WH727>, and the table <WH7979>, and the candlestick <WH4501>, and the altars <WH4196>, and the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH6944> wherewith they minister <WH8334> <WH8762>, and the hanging <WH4539>, and all the service <WH5656> thereof.

And Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548> shall be chief <WH5387> over the chief <WH5387> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, and have the oversight <WH6486> of them that keep <WH8104> <WH8802> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary <WH6944>.
Of M'rari <WH4847> was the family <WH4940> of the Mahlites <WH4250>, and the family <WH4940> of the Mushites <WH4188>: these are the families <WH4940> of M'rari <WH4847>.

And those that were numbered <WH6485> <WH8803> of them, according to the number <WH4557> of all the males <WH2145>, from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, were six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> and two hundred <WH3967>.

And the chief <WH5387> of the house <WH1004> of the father <WH1> of the families <WH4940> of M'rari <WH4847> was Zuriel <WH6700> the son <WH1121> of Abihail <WH32>: these shall pitch <WH2583> <WH8799> on the side <WH3409> of the tabernacle <WH4908> northward <WH6828>.

And under the custody <WH6486> and charge <WH4931> of the sons <WH1121> of M'rari <WH4847> shall be the boards <WH7175> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the bars <WH1280> thereof, and the pillars <WH5982> thereof, and the sockets <WH134> thereof, and all the vessels <WH3627> thereof, and all that serveth <WH5656> thereto,
And the pillars <WH5982> of the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439>, and their sockets <WH134>, and their pins <WH3489>, and their cords <WH4340>.

But those that encamp <WH2583> <WH8802> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> toward the east <WH6924>, even before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> eastward <WH4217>, shall be Mosheh <WH4872>, and Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, keeping <WH8104> <WH8802> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary <WH4720> for the charge <WH4931> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and the stranger <WH2114> <WH8801> that cometh nigh <WH7131> shall be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>.

All that were numbered <WH6485> <WH8803> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, which Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> numbered <WH6485> <WH8804> at the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>, throughout their families <WH4940>, all the males <WH2145> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, were twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Number <WH6485> <WH8798> all the firstborn <WH1060> of the males <WH2145> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, and take <WH5375> <WH8798> the number <WH4557> of their names <WH8034>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> the L'vi'im <WH3881> for me (I am the YY <WH3068> ) instead of all the firstborn <WH1060> among the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and the cattle <WH929> of the L'vi'im <WH3881> instead of all the firstlings <WH1060> among the cattle <WH929> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> numbered <WH6485> <WH8799>, as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him, all the firstborn <WH1060> among the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And all the firstborn <WH1060> males <WH2145> by the number <WH4557> of names <WH8034>, from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, of those that were numbered <WH6485> <WH8803> of them, were twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> two hundred <WH3967> and threescore and thirteen <WH7657> <WH7969>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Take <WH3947> <WH8798> the L'vi'im <WH3881> instead of all the firstborn <WH1060> among the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and the cattle <WH929> of the L'vi'im <WH3881> instead of their cattle <WH929>; and the L'vi'im <WH3881> shall be mine: I am the YY <WH3068>.

And for those that are to be redeemed <WH6302> of the two hundred <WH3967> and threescore and thirteen <WH7657> <WH7969> of the firstborn <WH1060> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which are more <WH5736> <WH8802> than <WH5921> the L'vi'im <WH3881>;

Thou shalt even take <WH3947> <WH8804> five <WH2568> shekels <WH8255> apiece by the poll <WH1538>, after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944> shalt thou take <WH3947> <WH8799> them: (the shekel <WH8255> is twenty <WH6242> gerahs <WH1626>:)
And thou shalt give <WH5414> <WH8804> the money <WH3701>, wherewith the odd number <WH5736> <WH8802> of them is to be redeemed <WH6302>, unto Aharon <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the redemption <WH6306> money <WH3701> of them that were over <WH5736> <WH8802> and above them that were redeemed <WH6302> by the L'vi'im <WH3881>:

Of the firstborn <WH1060> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> took <WH3947> <WH8804> he the money <WH3701>; a thousand <WH505> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and threescore <WH8346> and five <WH2568> shekels, after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944>:

And Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> the money <WH3701> of them that were redeemed <WH6302> <WH8675> <WH6306> unto Aharon <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>, according to the word <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>, as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872>.
